description: This is chocolate mousse, just not as you know it. Learn how to make this creamy dessert using avocado and coconut cream. It serves six but you wonâ€™t want to share.
keywords: Mousse,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Spring,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Oct 2020,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate,Avocado
name: Chocolate, Mint & Avocado Mousse Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 180g 70% cocoa dark chocolate (plus extra shaved to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place dark chocolate, syrup and half the avocado in a food processor and process to combine. While the motor is running, slowly add 1/2 cup coconut cream, processing until smooth and combined. Spoon mixture into a snap-lock bag. Snip off one corner, then pipe mixture into 4 glasses. Refrigerate until needed.

Wash and dry food processor. Place white chocolate, mint and remaining avocado into food processor and process until green and smooth. While the motor is running, slowly add 1/2 cup remaining coconut cream, processing until smooth. Spoon into a snap-lock bag. Snip off one corner, then pipe mixture over chocolate mousse. Refrigerate for 15 minutes to chill. Refrigerate remaining coconut cream until needed.
Spoon a little remaining coconut cream (see Tip) over mousse, then serve scattered with coconut flakes and extra chocolate.
